title: Merry Little Hookup
description: A sexy sugarplum wish come true…Holidays have been rough on Virginia Bennett, but things change when a long lost secret crush wanders into her bar on Christmas Eve.Reeling from a betrayal that upended his life, Ty Sievers is back home in Aspen for Christmas and looking for distraction, a balm for his battered ego. Little does he know, he’s about to have the holiday of a lifetime.It was only meant to be a merry little hookup, but will they give into the holiday magic, or will it all end before it even starts?
author: Sibylla Matilde
